Hero.title: Hi! I'm Luiz Gustavo Alves
Hero.content: Software Developer with experience in development of scalable and modern applications.

About.title: About
About.content: Get to know more about my background and skills

MainInfo.title: About me
MainInfo.content_1: I'm Luiz Gustavo Alves, Full Stack Developer and Bachelor in Computer Science at UNIFESP, Universidade Federal de São Paulo - Brazil. My academic background has given me solid knowledge in Algorithms, Data Structures, System Design, Databases which I apply to create efficient and modern systems.
MainInfo.content_2: I work as a Full Stack developer and I'm responsible for building new features, creating unit and end-to-end tests and making code maintenance in order to improve the performance and system scalability. Our team works in a Content Management System (CMS) applications to update factory and resellers websites in real-time.
MainInfo.content_3: My software development skills includes: NextJs, NestJs, Typescript, JavaScript, React, Tailwind, Prisma, Postgres, MongoDB, Redis, Python, Node.js, HTML + CSS. I also have knowledge in message queue and job processing (BullMQ & RabbitMQ), microservices (AWS & Docker) and application monitoring (Prometheus & Grafana). Along with development skills, I have experience in software testing such as: unit testing, end-to-end testing and stress testing using Jest, Cypress and Grafana k6.

University.title: Bachelor in Computer Science
University.content: UNIFESP - Universidade Federal de São Paulo
